courseDescription:
The Microsoft Outlook online course begins by showing you the reasons why you should make the switch to Outlook 2010 from previous versions of the software. You will learn how to navigate the ribbon and understand the different tasks that it can be used for. You will then learn how to create, manage, and organize your email, calendar, contacts, and tasks. The course will also show you how to enrich your email with attachments and business cards.

One of the most important features of Microsoft Outlook mail is the conversation view for eliminating excess emails in your inbox. This course will cover this feature clearly and simply. You will then learn the use of Quick Steps and Outlook Social Connector as well as how to manage your information and create RSS web feeds. The course will also teach you how to use Instant Search to quickly locate a file, how to speed up your email with efficient attachments, and how to create templates that you can reuse.

This free online Microsoft Office Outlook course will be of great interest to professionals in any business who wish to organize their schedule and emails in a professional manner. This is a core skill-set required in any career. So check out the course now, and bring your emailing and personal information management skills to the next level in no time at all!
